inputParameters.name: goal_constraints
inputParameters.description: The goal to be achieved, defined in a set of constraints. Constraints can be very specific, for example defining value domains for each joint, such that the goal configuration is included, or defining a volume in space, to which a specific robot link (e.g. the end-effector) is required to move to.

inputParameters.name: start_configuration
inputParameters.description: The robot's full configuration, i.e. values for all configurable joints of the entire robot, at the starting position. Defaults to the all-zero configuration.

inputParameters.name: group
inputParameters.description: The planning group used for calculation. Defaults to the robot's main planning group.

inputParameters.name: attached_collision_meshes
inputParameters.description: A list of attached collision meshes to be included for planning.

inputParameters.name: path_constraints
inputParameters.description: Optional constraints that can be imposed along the solution path. Note that path calculation won't work if the start_configuration violates these constraints. Defaults to None.

inputParameters.name: planner_id
inputParameters.description: The name of the algorithm used for path planning. Defaults to 'RRTConnectkConfigDefault'
